Weth.name: Weth
Weth.desc:
<c=2a767d>WETH</c>
A treasure hunter. her cards focus on <c=keyword>multi-attack</c> and <c=keyword>midrow elimination</c>. She also finds <c=heal>goodies</c> hidden in plain sight.

Goodie.name: Goodies
Goodie.desc: Goodies discovered from breaking apart structures.

Pulsedrive.name: Pulsedrive
Pulsedrive.desc: Add {0} damage to all attacks. <c=downside>Goes away at the start of next turn.</c>

Recoil.name: Recoil
Recoil.desc: The next {0} attacks will deal 1 less damage.

Splitshot.name: SPLITSHOT
Splitshot.desc: If attack hits a midrow object, the attack splits into two: one to the left and one to the right.
Splitshot.pierceDesc: If attack hits a midrow object, the attack splits into three: one to the left, one center, one to the right.

Bayblast.name: BAYBLAST
Bayblast.desc:
Shoots a blast from the missile bay, destroying whatever midrow object is in front <c=keyword>as if the foe destroyed them.</c>
Deals {0} damage to invincible objects.

WideBayblast.name: WIDE BAYBLAST
WideBayblast.desc:
Shoots a blast from the missile bay, destroying whatever midrow objects are in the adjacent and front <c=keyword>as if the foe destroyed them.</c>
Deals {0} damage to invincible objects.

BubbleLeech.name: BUBBLE LEECH
BubbleLeech.desc: Steals the midrow object's bubble, giving 1 <c=status>BUBBLE</c> to self.

Harmless.name: HARMLESS
Harmless.desc: This Bayblast will deal no damage. <c=keyword>Instead, this will activate the drone this blast hits.</c>

BayBlastFail.desc: <c=downside>Warning:</c> no missile bays to channel this attack!

Autouseexhaust.name: Auto Exhaust
Autouseexhaust.desc:
Automatically plays upon discard if energy is sufficient.
<c=downside>Exhausted after use.</c>

Autousedestroy.name: Auto Single-use
Autousedestroy.desc:
Automatically plays upon discard if energy is sufficient.
<c=downside>Destroyed after use.</c>

GiantAsteroid.name: Giant Asteroid
GiantAsteroid.desc: When destroyed, splits into two <c=drone>asteroids</c> in adjacent spots.

MegaAsteroid.name: Mega Asteroid
MegaAsteroid.desc: When destroyed, splits into two <c=drone>giant asteroids</c> in adjacent spots.

TreasureSeeker.name: TREASURE SEEKER
TreasureSeeker.desc:
Replaces <c=artifact>TREASURE HUNTER</c>.
After <c=keyword>10 hits</c>, add a random <c=card>Goodie A</c> to your hand. <c=downside>Count resets at the end of combat.</c>
Gain special goodies from defeating zone bosses and elites!
<c=downside>Limited to <c=keyword>1</c> uncommon goodie in your deck.</c>

HiddenOptions.name: HIDDEN OPTIONS
HiddenOptions.desc:
Immediately choose 1 of 3 common artifacts.
Then choose 1 of 3 hidden <c=2a767d>WETH</c> relics.

ResidualShot.name: RESIDUAL SHOT
ResidualShot.desc: Shoot for 0 damage when you play a <c=2a767d>Weth</c> or <c=peri>Peri</c> card.

CannonRecharge.name: CANNON RECHARGE
CannonRecharge.desc: If you end your turn with more than 0 <c=energy>ENERGY</c>, gain 1 <c=status>STUN CHARGE</c> next turn.

PowerCrystals.name: POWER CRYSTALS
PowerCrystals.desc:
Whenever you gain <c=status>PULSEDRIVE</c>, gain <c=status>SHARD</c> instead. Increase attack damage by the amount of <c=status>SHARD</c> you have.
<c=downside>Lose 1 <c=status>SHARD</c> at start of turn</c>

PyroCannon.name: PYRO-CANNON
PyroCannon.desc:
Heat affects damage done.
<c=downside>Overheat limit is reduced by 1.</c>

MadcapTarge.name: MADCAP TARGE
MadcapTarge.desc:
The first time you gain <c=status>SHIELD</c>, increase all damage by shield gained.
<c=downside>The first time you gain <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>, decrease all <c=keyword>base</c> damage by 1.
Resets on turn end.</c>

MadcapCharge.name: MADCAP CHARGE
MadcapCharge.desc: Once per turn, stunning an enemy intent gives 1 <c=status>PULSEDRIVE</c>.

PowerSprint.name: POWERSPRINT
PowerSprint.desc: <c=downside>Your <c=status>EVADE</c> is capped at 5.</c> Once per turn, convert excess <c=status>EVADE</c> into <c=status>PULSEDRIVE</c>.

HiddenGem.name: HIDDEN GEM
HiddenGem.desc:
Choose 1 of 3 Uncommon <c=trait>non-temp</c> <c=card>Goodie</c>. Instead of <c=trait>Single Use</c>, it has <c=trait>Exhaust</c>.
Bypass any restrictions to gaining uncommon goodies.

HiddenOptions2.name: HIDDEN OPTIONS II
HiddenOptions2.desc:
Immediately choose 1 of 4 boss artifacts.
Then choose 1 of 4 hidden <c=2a767d>WETH</c> relics.

TerminusMilestone.name: TERMINUS: MILESTONE
TerminusMilestone.desc:
Get rewards for reaching milestones from defeating enemies!
Earn <c=keyword>4 points</c> for boss, <c=keyword>2 points</c> for elites, <c=keyword>1 point</c> for the rest.
For every 2 points past the last milestone, gain 1 of 3 hidden <c=2a767d>WETH</c> relics.
<c=downside>You are limited to 1 <c=artifact>TERMINUS</c> artifact.</c>

TerminusJaunt.name: TERMINUS: JAUNT
TerminusJaunt.desc:
1 random enemy part offers 1 of 3 <c=2a767d>WETH</c> relics when shot at.
For every 5th relic uncovered, instead gain 1 of 3 common artifacts.
<c=keyword>Receive these rewards at the end of combat.</c>
<c=downside>You can only obtain one relic or artifact per battle.
You are limited to 1 <c=artifact>TERMINUS</c> artifact.</c>

TreasureHunter.name: TREASURE HUNTER
TreasureHunter.desc:
Once per combat, after <c=keyword>10 hits</c>, add a random <c=card>Goodie</c> to your hand.
Gain special goodies from defeating zone bosses!
<c=downside>Limited to <c=keyword>1</c> uncommon goodie in your deck.</c>

SpaceRelics.name: SPACE RELICS
SpaceRelics.desc:
<c=2a767d>Weth</c> found some cool <c=ba3535>s</c><c=ba6e35>p</c><c=baa735>a</c><c=87ba36>c</c><c=3aba36>e</c> <c=36ba95>r</c><c=36adba>e</c><c=367aba>l</c><c=364aba>i</c><c=6636ba>c</c><c=b436ba>s</c>!
Each combat, gain:

RelicShield.name: RELIC: SHIELD
RelicShield.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>SHIELD</c> at the start of combat.

RelicTempShield.name: RELIC: TEMP SHIELD
RelicTempShield.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>TEMPORARY SHIELD</c> at the start of combat.

RelicHermes.name: RELIC: HERMES
RelicHermes.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>HERMES</c> at the start of combat.

RelicEvade.name: RELIC: EVADE
RelicEvade.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>EVADE</c> at the start of combat.

RelicAutododgeRight.name: RELIC: AUTODODGE RIGHT
RelicAutododgeRight.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>AUTODODGE RIGHT</c> at the start of combat.

RelicFlux.name: RELIC: FLUX
RelicFlux.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>FLUX</c> at the start of combat.

RelicStunCharge.name: RELIC: STUN CHARGE
RelicStunCharge.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>STUN CHARGE</c> at the start of combat.

RelicDrawNextTurn.name: RELIC: DRAW NEXT TURN
RelicDrawNextTurn.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>DRAW NEXT TURN</c> at the start of combat.

RelicEnergyFragment.name: RELIC: ENERGY FRAGMENT
RelicEnergyFragment.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY FRAGMENT</c> at the start of combat.

RelicTempPayback.name: RELIC: TEMP PAYBACK
RelicTempPayback.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>TEMPORARY PAYBACK</c> at the start of combat.

RelicDroneShift.name: RELIC: DRONE SHIFT
RelicDroneShift.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>DRONE SHIFT</c> at the start of combat.

RelicShard.name: RELIC: SHARD
RelicShard.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>SHARD</c> at the start of combat.

RelicBoost.name: RELIC: BOOST
RelicBoost.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>BOOST</c> at the start of combat.

RelicPulsedrive.name: RELIC: PULSEDIVE
RelicPulsedrive.desc: Gain 1 <c=status>PULSEDIVE</c> at the start of combat.

Tooltips.JauntActive: One of the enemy's parts will grant you a reward if struck!
Tooltips.JauntInactive: None of the enemy's parts will grant you a reward.
Tooltips.JauntReward: You hit the jackpot! Finish the battle to collect your relic!
Tooltips.JauntAltReward: You hit the jackpot! Finish the battle to collect your artifact!
Tooltips.MilestoneEnd: You've got them all! Any additional advancements will give you <c=2a767d>WETH</c> relics.

CrisisCall.name: Crisis Call
CrisisCall.desc:
Give 3 <c=status>PULSEDRIVE</c> on play,
<c=downside>forcibly  exhausted on discard.</c>
CrisisCall.descB:
Give 7 <c=status>PULSEDRIVE</c> on play,
<c=downside>forcibly  exhausted on discard.</c>
